content.text: [@myf](@GLH9VPzvvU2KcnnUu2n5oxOqaTUtzw+Rk6fd/Kb9Si0=.ed25519) Sorry, totally misunderstood that. I've opened an issue [here](https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/mutter/issues/327), any chance you have something similar in the output of `journalctl`? I'm thinking I'll likely try to debug userspace before making an issue at the samus repo.
